ygData.subject: Re: Well tiime to get POed pottery buffs....
ygData.msgSnippet: well, they said altered =P In other words, reduced :) It COULD mean raised, but you know it doesn t :) -Rennin of E Ci Trade Council GM
ygData.messageBody:
well, they said 'altered' =P In other words, reduced :) It COULD mean raised, but
you know it doesn't :)
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM

"Z.M. Kulik" wrote:

> From: "Z.M. Kulik" <direhawk@...>
>
> The funny thing is they said in the patch message that the profitability of
> Pottery was " ENHANCED " not reduced.
>
> Nick Emmerich wrote:
>
> > From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
> >
> > I coulda told you this was going to happen =P What's the word on mixing bowls?
> > -Rennin of E'Ci
> > Trade Council GM
> >
> > Eric E Cathell wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Eric E Cathell" <embroidery@...>
> > >
> > > so heres the new deal on pottery
> > > Pie tin sketch 1225c
> > > flask of h2o 15c
> > > 2x clay 100c
> > > HQ fire 50c
> > > total 1390c
> > > pie tin 560c
> > >
> > > loss of 830cp
